Body: Merely saying Use this code" is not a proper answer
column9: even if it turns out to work.  You should invest at least a few words in explaining what your version does that corrects an issue in the code proposed by the question.  Otherwise you force people to do an "eyeball diff" to figure out what your actual recommendation is
